### If you are experiencing financial hardships during COVID-19, below are resources to contact:

Phone: 361-575-0478

Fax: 361-578-0062

Email: yolandalozano@cacv.us

Note: You can also visit their website at
[www.cacv.us](http://www.cacv.us)
for more information.

Phone: 361-798-9111

### Help us go paperless! [Paperless Billing Form](http://cityofhallettsville.org/files/FILLABLE%20Help%20us%20go%20paperless.pdf#overlay-context=utilities)

### To make a utility billing payment online, please follow this link to the [City’s](https://www.municipalonlinepayments.com/hallettsvilletx) [online](https://www.municipalonlinepayments.com/hallettsvilletx) [payment webpage.](https://www.municipalonlinepayments.com/hallettsvilletx)

**[Cliff Riddle](mailto:utilitypayments@cityofhallettsville.org)
–**
Utility Billing Specialist

Phone: 361- 798-3681

Utility bills are due and payable on the 10th day of each month unless the 10th day falls on any city or postal holiday or weekend. Then the due day will be extended to the next open business day. Failure to make timely payment shall result in a 10% penalty or minimum charge of $5.00.

If a customer needs water cut-off at meter, the customer must contact City of Hallettsville Utilities at City Hall, 361-798-3681 or Public Works at 361-798-2201.

[**2024 Consumer Confidence Report**](https://cityofhallettsville.org/wp-content/uploads/2025/09/2024-CCR.pdf)

Updated LSLI Notice November 2024
–
[**PDF**](https://cityofhallettsville.org/wp-content/uploads/2024/11/LSLI.pdf)
This is for customers that have been previously notified that they have Galvanized Requiring Replacement water lines.

TDS – Waste Wizard (Sign up for notifications and schedule) –
**[(View)](https://cityofhallettsville.org/wp-content/uploads/2025/11/Waste-Wizard-graphic.jpg)**

Residential service days: Thursday (garbage), Every other Monday (recycling) Click here for the
[**2025 Recycling Schedule**
.](https://cityofhallettsville.org/wp-content/uploads/2025/01/Calendar-2025.pdf)

Commercial service days: Varies, please call for more information specific to your address.

There is no service on Thanksgiving Day, Christmas Day, or New Year’s Day.

The transfer station is located at
**[804 CR 201, Hallettsville, TX 77964](https://www.google.com/maps/preview#!q=Hallettsville+Transfer+Station%2C+County+Road+201%2C+Hallettsville%2C+TX&data=!1m4!1m3!1d2054!2d-96.9060797!3d29.4534945!2m1!1e3!4m15!2m14!1m13!1s0x8643bac41fe1221f%3A0xf74e4792dca1d144!3m8!1m3!1d748!2d-96.9064841!3d29.4545068!3m2!1i1280!2i908!4f35!4m2!3d29.453494!4d-96.90608&fid=7)**

Hours of Operation: Monday, 8 A.M. – 4 P.M., Wednesday & Saturday, 8 A.M. – 12 P.M.

If you are a new utility customer, download and complete the appropriate application. You can then submit the application via mail, fax, or
[**email**](http://mailto:utilitypayments@cityofhallettsville.org)
.

**[New Residential Customer Application Packet](https://cityofhallettsville.org/wp-content/uploads/2024/05/New-Residential-Customer-Application-Packet_001.pdf)
(PDF)**

**[New Commericial Customer Application](http://cityofhallettsville.org/files/2014%2001%2006%20New%20Commercial.pdf#overlay-context=node/11%3Fq%3Dnode/11)
(PDF)**

If you are a new or current customer and you are a Critical Care or Chronic Condition customer please read the following information.
